explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper proposes a battery charging control methodology based on reinforcement learning (RL) to minimize charging costs.
explanations.neural network: The paper utilizes a long short-term memory (LSTM) network, which is a type of neural network, for predicting fluctuating electricity prices.
explanations.deep learning: The use of LSTM networks indicates the application of deep learning techniques in the proposed methodology.
explanations.long short-term memory: An LSTM network is leveraged to improve the prediction precision of fluctuating electricity prices.
explanations.LSTM: An LSTM network is used in the methodology to enhance the accuracy of electricity price predictions.
